original_text: Then you will attack them. You, with your armies and all the people with you, will attack them like a great storm. You will be like a dark cloud that covers the land.
korean_text: 네가 올라오되 너와 네 모든 떼와 너와 함께 한 많은 백성이 광풍 같이 이르고 구름 같이 땅을 덮으리라

sentences.original_text: and all the people with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너와 함께 있는 모든 백성과 함께

sentences.original_text: will attack them like a great storm.
You will be like a dark cloud
